channel.title: PvP - Opinions
channel.description:
So we've had PvP for a few days now, and this thread will be where you can post your opinions on it. I will also post what I have heard from people, the good and the bad:
[u][b]The Good:[/b][/u]
[ul][li]Raiding towns/homes can be a fun way for factions to interact[/li] [li]Some people enjoy the rush of a 1v1 battle[/li] [li]If a griefer decides to visit [i]while you are on[/i] (which isn't often), you can kill them.[/li][/ul]
[b][u]The Bad:[/u][/b]
[ul][li]Raiding towns/homes can take the fun out of it for people that only like to build, not PvP[/li] [li]If a griefer decides to visit [i]while you are not on[/i], it doesn't help you at all.[/li] [li]A griefer could instead kill YOU every time you teleported to your house.[/li] [li]"Dicks who say to come into their house saying its a peace treaty then kill you and take your shit and say "I didn't pick up your diamond sword"."[/li] [li]Griefers can use it to their advantage by killing you if they want to grief[/li][/ul]
There are just a few I've heard, so post yours here as well.

I was told when I protested griefers, I should move away, far away. I did, so why doesn’t everyone else?

item.title: PvP - Opinions
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

If we keep PvP something like this could be cool. Actual raid groups, teams etc

http://forum.hey0.net/showthread.php?tid=1566

Edit: Just found something else, could possibly be useful but I didn’t read the whole thread so I’m not 100% on this one.

http://forum.hey0.net/showthread.php?tid=260

Basically it allows you to set zones with certain laws, such as:

LAWS EXPLODE - Allow creepers and TNT to detonate. BREAK - Allow block breakage. ( Destroy. ) MOBSPAWN - Allow spawning of Mobs. DAMAGE - Allow the health system. ( Setting this to false will make players invincible. ) MOVE - Allow movement. PVP - Allow PVP. ( Server setting must be set to true. ) IGNITE - Allow use of lighter. BUILD - Allow placement of blocks. LITTER - Allow dropping of items. TELEPORT - Allow all forms of teleportation. ( Warp/Summon/QuickPort/ETC. ) SCAVENGE - Allow picking up items from the floor.

So within a defined area you could allow/not allow those on the list. Safe zones (from players, mobs or both), no build zones etc

item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

Personally, I think it would be a good idea to make like a 1000 block square around the spawn (not really that big if you think of the total size of the map) where no one could attack each other. This keeps pvping as it is for the most part, removes spawn killing, and gives people a nice chunk of area to just build in. If that 1000 block square ends up being to small, we could enlarge it, etc.

[quote=“RuneSpace, post:2, topic:377990”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=473875.msg3464886#msg3464886 date=1294808794]

That way if I killed corey, he would have 24 hours until I could kill him again. Obviously the only exception to this rule would be self defense. If he attacked me, then I could kill him again.
